title: Kyonyuu Onna Senshi: Dogeza Saimin

alternative_titles.ja: 巨乳女戦士・土下座催眠

synopsis: A colosseum stands on an unnamed island, where warriors from all over the land fight for riches and glory. When a low level warrior finds the power of hypnosis, he is determined to punish all the female warriors that ridiculed him by unleashing all his dark desires on them in the ring.  Will the fierce red-headed Stella, the busty priestess Iris, and the cunning dark elf Viola be able to stand up to his hypnotic powers or will they get corrupted by his perversions?
